title: Application Tracker
description:
Created a full stack application to help users save their job application details at a single place with details such as - Company, Role and Status.
Added notes section to note important points and Resume section to save different resumes for specific roles.

title: Company Finances Manager
description:
Architected a web app to help display all the finances of a company at a single place. Added functionalities to manage clients, projects, employees, payments, etc.
Addad an interactive dashboard to help visualize finances and enabled Key Point Indicators.

title: AttendEase
description: A web app, primarily for RCOEM students to check their attendance in a user friendly interface, without the hassle in less than half the time!

title: Portfolio
description: Developed a portofolio to showcase skills, projects and experiences using Next.js and Tailwind CSS

title: Algorithmic Trading
description: Developed a stock prediction model, which predicts top stocks from each sector based on their price change in different time periods such as 1month, 3month, 6month, 1year, 3year, etc.

title: OTP Verification API
description:
Created an API to register and verify users using OTP and update user data after authentication.
Integrated libraries such as nodemailer and JWT.
